name: part_010
file: tmp_【HOPE TO THE FUTURE 3D LIVE】 IRyS 2024 Birthday Live! #IRySBDay [cc5SQqswwMM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: IRyS finishes her merchandise announcement and announces a members-only after-birthday stream.
IRyS performs a cover of "Shuuketsu no Sono e" (集結の園へ).

subtitles.original: signature and a special message from me, yes.
subtitles.english: signature and a special message from me, yes.

subtitles.original: えっと、今回のねセット特典のポストカードになっています。
subtitles.english: These are the postcards that come as a bonus for the sets this time.

subtitles.original: えっと、今回も、前回と同じく、えっと、限定数量限定バージョンと通常セットも両方ともあります。
subtitles.english: This time, just like last time, we have both a limited quantity version and a regular set.

subtitles.original: 数量限定の方ではアイリスの、あの、直筆サインを一枚一枚大切に書かせていただきますんで、えっと、それ希望の方はぜひ早めにご購入をお願いします。
subtitles.english: For the limited quantity version, I'll be hand-signing each one with care, so if you'd like one, please purchase it early.

subtitles.original: えっと、通常セットもぜひあるんで、えっと、期間、期間限定じゃなくて、数量限定のがもしなくなった場合はぜひぜひ、通常限定もよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: We also have the regular sets, so if the limited quantity ones sell out, please check out the regular ones.

subtitles.original: 通常限定じゃない、通常の方もよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Not regular limited, I mean regular! Please check them out.

subtitles.original: そちらの方でもアイリスのね、あの多分、汚い字ではなく、綺麗なアイリスの、あの箔押し、サインとメッセージがついていますのでぜひそちらもゲットしてください。
subtitles.english: Those will also have my stamped foil signature and message—not in messy handwriting, but in my neatest script—so please get those too!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: And, whew, that was the merch announcement!
subtitles.english: And, whew, that was the merch announcement!

subtitles.original: Yay! How do- how do you guys like the merch? I honestly really, really like the merch this time.
subtitles.english: Yay! How do- how do you guys like the merch? I honestly really, really like the merch this time.

subtitles.original: 今回、えー、グッズどうでしたか？すごく今回のグッズすごく楽しみにっていうか、めちゃめちゃ出来いいんじゃないかなっていう風に思ってるんで、ぜひゲットしてください。
subtitles.english: What did you think of the merch? I was really looking forward to it, and I think it turned out really well, so please go get it.

subtitles.original: And, not just that, there's still one more announcement! まだね、もう一つ告知あります。
subtitles.english: And, not just that, there's still one more announcement! I still have one more thing to share.

subtitles.original: なんと！I will be having a members-only after-birthday stream! Right after this! Yay!
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, I will be having a members-only after-birthday stream right after this! Yay!

subtitles.original: It is a special stream to thank my members. I will be singing more songs there.
subtitles.english: It is a special stream to thank my members. I will be singing more songs there.

subtitles.original: So if you want to hear more IRyS singing after the stream, do join my membership, Nephil-family!
subtitles.english: So if you want to hear more IRyS singing after the stream, do join my membership, Nephil-family!

subtitles.original: And be there! And I hope you be there.
subtitles.english: And be there! And I hope you be there.

subtitles.original: はい。えっと、今回は、なんと初めてのね、あの、誕生日記念配信の後の、えっと、メン限配信やります！
subtitles.english: Yes. This time, believe it or not, I'll be doing my first members-only after-birthday stream!

subtitles.original: そちらの方でもね、アイリス歌うんで、こちらの配信でね、えっと、「もうちょっとアイリスの曲、アイリスの歌聴きたいなー」っていう気分になった方はぜひぜひ、
subtitles.english: I'll be singing there too, so if this stream leaves you feeling like you want to hear a bit more of my songs and singing, then...

subtitles.original: アイリスのメンバーシップに加入していただくと、そのすぐあとに、えっと、メンバー限定配信のアクセスできるんで、ぜひ加入して見に来てくださいね！
subtitles.english: ...if you join IRyS's membership, you can access the members-only stream right after, so please join and come watch!

subtitles.original: ふー、ではではでは。
subtitles.english: Whew, now then...

subtitles.original: Now that I have announced my merch, I think we're getting towards the last part, but there is still more singing obviously.
subtitles.english: Now that I have announced my merch, I think we're getting towards the last part, but there is still more singing, obviously.

subtitles.original: And since we're singing more songs, I think we need to move back to the arena, this very arena! Yeah!
subtitles.english: And since we're singing more songs, I think we need to move back to the arena, this very arena! Yeah!

subtitles.original: えっと、まだ曲歌いますけど、そろそろ、あの、最後の方になってきましたんで、えっと、次の曲はね、えっと、またアリーナの方に戻りたいなーと思っています。
subtitles.english: I'll still be singing songs, but we're getting near the end, so for the next song, I'd like to return to the arena.

subtitles.original: では、いきましょう！Let's go!
subtitles.english: So, let's go! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 花びら　散りゆく
subtitles.english: Petals falling away

subtitles.original: 夢なら　果てなく
subtitles.english: If it's a dream, it's endless

subtitles.original: それなら　涙は
subtitles.english: In that case, the tears...

subtitles.original: 何処へと還らん
subtitles.english: To where shall they return?

subtitles.original: 仕組まれている
subtitles.english: It is being contrived

subtitles.original: 終結さえも
subtitles.english: Even the end

subtitles.original: 求め過ぎてた
subtitles.english: I had sought too much

subtitles.original: 答えならば
subtitles.english: For the answer

subtitles.original: 記号の中で
subtitles.english: Within the symbols

subtitles.original: 泳ぎ疲れて
subtitles.english: Tired of swimming

subtitles.original: 行き着く先は
subtitles.english: The destination

subtitles.original: ただの「仮初」
subtitles.english: Is just a "temporary thing"

subtitles.original: 永いとき　はなれても
subtitles.english: Even if separated for a long time

subtitles.original: 知っている　必ず呼び合う　絆を
subtitles.english: I know the bonds that will surely call to each other

subtitles.original: 運命と呼ぶこと
subtitles.english: Calling it destiny

subtitles.original: 抱いて　抱きしめても
subtitles.english: Embracing, even if holding tight

subtitles.original: 抜け出せない　定められた境界から
subtitles.english: I cannot escape from the determined boundary

subtitles.original: 溶けてなくなるほどの
subtitles.english: To the point of melting away

subtitles.original: 進化へと　おかえりなさい
subtitles.english: Welcome back to evolution

subtitles.original: 白い結晶が降りそそぐ街
subtitles.english: The city where white crystals pour down

subtitles.original: 全ては包まれるだけ
subtitles.english: Everything is just enveloped

subtitles.original: 誰が決めた訳でもない
subtitles.english: No one decided this

subtitles.original: 夢へ　おかえりなさい
subtitles.english: Welcome back to the dream

subtitles.original: 心のままに
subtitles.english: Just as your heart desires

subtitles.original: 君の瞳に
subtitles.english: In your eyes

subtitles.original: 映るその影
subtitles.english: The shadow reflected

subtitles.original: 何を想って　何を見てる
subtitles.english: What are you thinking? What are you seeing?

subtitles.original: 感じる事に
subtitles.english: To feeling

subtitles.original: 信じる事に
subtitles.english: To believing

subtitles.original: 委ねる事に
subtitles.english: To yielding
